column3: cr ACK fa27d6d3ac065684a1219e9a948514d27929cf7c: patch looks correct and rationale makes sense\n\nThanks for cleaning up!

Concept ACK.

1. The fuzzbuzz integration configuration file was added in #18634, and it is really not useful in this repo.
2. The `--enable-danger-fuzz-link-all` option was added in #20560 for backwards compatibility (see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20560#issuecomment-743747317 and https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20560#issuecomment-744665263).
